attributes.action: Preserve HMS Invincible as a working museum and monument to the Falklands Conflict
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
HMS Invincible could be restored and maintained as part of a continous engineering training program for the RN so as to enable the ship to be used as a working exhibit and monument to the Falklands Conflict.

The vessel could be berthed in HM Naval Base Devonport as part of the proposed historical site there.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
